thread.title: Relativity Media Plan to Sell Assets Faces Resistance From Directors, Networks
thread.title_full: Relativity Media Plan to Sell Assets Faces Resistance From Directors, Networks - WSJ

author: Tom Corrigan
title: Relativity Media Plan to Sell Assets Faces Resistance From Directors, Networks
text:
Relativity Media LLCâ€™s plan to sell its assets to the highest bidder is facing growing resistance from directors, networks and other Hollywood heavyweights who say the proposal tramples their rights.
In more than 20 objections filed in U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Manhattan this week, companies that have done business with the film and television studio expressed concern that its coming sale will prevent it from fulfilling commitments it... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
